problems.question: How do you make the number one disappear by adding to it?
problems.title: Number
problems.answer: Add the letter 'G' and it becomes Gone

problems.question: What question can you never honestly answer yes to?
problems.title: Honesty

problems.question: Can you name three consecutive days without using the words Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, or Sunday?
problems.title: Consecutive days
problems.answer: Add the letter 'G' and it becomes Gone

problems.question: David's father has three sons : Snap, Crackle and _____ ?
problems.title: David's father

problems.question: What has many keys, but can't even open a single door?
problems.title: The keys
